feed.title: Enclosed Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.12.0
entry.content:
[!WARNING]
Breaking change in the cli create note command You need to use --stdin or -s to use the sdin as note content, it'll no longer fallback to stdin if no positionnal arg is set

What's Changed

  • refactor(storage): added some cloudflare KV 413 error management by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/342
  • Update nl.json by @SamKr in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/345
  • refactor(i18n): added missing keys in fr locales by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/346
  • refactor(docs): proper sorting of locales in the i18n table by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/347
  • chore: removed unused root .npmrc by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/348
  • feat(note-view): added loading state by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/350
  • chore: update notes.models.test.ts by @eltociear in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/354
  • Updated italian language by @rfazi in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/353
  • Add Turkish translation by @beyenilmez in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/356
  • feat(i18n): update Simplified Chinese language by @dishao123 in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/363
  • Add Chinese (zh-TW) translations by @JerryShr in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/368
  • feat(cli): support uploading files by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/359

New Contributors

  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/354
  • @rfazi made their first contribution in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/353
  • @beyenilmez made their first contribution in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/356
  • @dishao123 made their first contribution in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/363
  • @JerryShr made their first contribution in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/368

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.11.0...v1.12.0

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.13.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(i18n): added Polish Language by @nkkfs in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/372
  • chore(deps): update packageManager to pnpm@9.15.0 across all packages by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/375

New Contributors

  • @nkkfs made their first contribution in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/372

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.12.0...v1.13.0

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(node): add support for native HTTPS configuration by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/376

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.13.0...v1.14.0

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.15.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(ui): conditionally display "New Note" button based on authentication status by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/379
  • feat(view-note): prevent note password auto-completion from auth password by @dhenry123 in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/389
  • chore(CI): replace corepack enable with official pnpm action by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/397
  • feat(i18n): update Simplified Chinese translations by @GabrielxDuO in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/401
  • feat(config): added a configuration to add prefix to the view note url by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/418
  • chore(deps): updated some dependencies

New Contributors

  • @dhenry123 made their first contribution in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/389

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.14.0...v1.15.0

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.16.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(docs): corrected ghcr Docker image references in self-hosting documentation by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/425
  • fix(i18n): updated Vietnamese translation by @kogakisaki in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/440
  • feat(i18n): add Indonesian translations by @crystalshower in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/435
  • fix(notes): proper default settings when resetting state by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/443
  • chore(deps): update dependency tsx to v4.19.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/410
  • chore(deps): update dependency esbuild to ^0.25.0 [security] by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/400
  • chore(deps): update dependency typescript to v5.8.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/415

New Contributors

  • @crystalshower made their first contribution in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/435

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.15.0...v1.16.0
